root.name: not (logical NOT)

example.code: a = False if not a: rect(30, 20, 50, 50) a = True if a: line(20, 10, 90, 80) line(20, 80, 90, 10)

root.description: Inverts the Boolean value of an expression. Returns True if the expression is False and returns False if the expression is True. If the expression (a>b) evaluates to True, then not(a>b) evaluates to False.
